description:
Versioning when using Git, solved.

Versioning when using Git, solved.
GitVersion looks at your git history and works out the Semantic Version of the commit being built.
As part of this release we had 88 commits which resulted in 8 issues being closed.Bug
- #4196 [ISSUE]: Syntax error in generated GitVersionInformation class when using project namespace
Documentation
- !4188 add link to docs version 5.12.0
- !4220 Improve documentation around version strategies
Improvements
- !4202 Move regex patterns to a common file
- !4246 Move creation of Regex to a central location
- !4259 Moved direct usages of IGitRepository to IRepositoryStore
